017package org.microbean.qualifier;
018
019import java.lang.constant.Constable;
020import java.lang.constant.ConstantDesc;
021import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
022import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
023import java.lang.constant.MethodTypeDesc;
024
025import java.util.Objects;
026import java.util.Optional;
027
028import org.microbean.development.annotation.Experimental;
029
030import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
031import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Object;
032import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.DEFAULT_NAME;
033import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.NULL;
034import static java.lang.constant.DirectMethodHandleDesc.Kind.STATIC;
035
036import static org.microbean.qualifier.ConstantDescs.CD_Qualified;
037import static org.microbean.qualifier.ConstantDescs.CD_Qualifiers;
038
039/**
040 * A {@link Constable} pairing of a {@link Qualifiers} and a thing
041 * that is qualified by them.
042 *
043 * @param <T> the type of the thing that is qualified
044 *
045 * @param qualifiers the {@link Qualifiers}; must not be {@code null}
046 *
047 * @param qualified the thing being qualified; may be {@code null}
048 *
049 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
050 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
051 *
052 * @see Qualifiers
053 */
054@Experimental
055public record Qualified<T>(Qualifiers<?, ?> qualifiers, T qualified) implements Constable {
056
057
058  /*
059   * Canonical constructor.
060   */
061
062
063  /**
064   * Creates a new {@link Qualified}.
065   *
066   * @param qualifiers the {@link Qualifiers}; must not be {@code null}
067   *
068   * @param qualified the thing being qualified; may be {@code null}
069   *
070   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code qualifiers} is {@code
071   * null}
072   */
073  public Qualified {
074    qualifiers = Objects.requireNonNull(qualifiers, "qualifiers");
075  }
076
077
078  /*
079   * Instance methods.
080   */
081
082
083  /**
084   * Returns an {@link Optional} containing the nominal descriptor for
085   * this instance, if one can be constructed, or an {@linkplain
086   * Optional#isEmpty() empty} {@link Optional} if one cannot be
087   * constructed.
088   *
089   * <p>This method will return an {@linkplain Optional#isEmpty()
090   * empty} {@link Optional} if the return value of {@link
091   * #qualified()} is not {@code null} and is not an instance of
092   * {@link Constable}.</p>
093   *
094   * @return an {@link Optional} containing the nominal descriptor for
095   * this instance, if one can be constructed, or an {@linkplain
096   * Optional#isEmpty() empty} {@link Optional} if one cannot be
097   * constructed; never {@code null}
098   *
099   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
100   *
101   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
102   *
103   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
104   * threads.
105   */
106  @Override // Constable
107  public final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable() {
108    final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> qualifiersDesc = this.qualifiers().describeConstable();
109    if (qualifiersDesc.isPresent()) {
110      final T qualified = this.qualified();
111      final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> qualifiedDesc;
112      if (qualified == null) {
113        qualifiedDesc = Optional.of(NULL);
114      } else if (qualified instanceof Constable c) {
115        qualifiedDesc = c.describeConstable();
116      } else {
117        qualifiedDesc = Optional.empty();
118      }
119      if (qualifiedDesc.isPresent()) {
120        return
121          Optional.of(DynamicConstantDesc.ofNamed(BSM_INVOKE,
122                                                  DEFAULT_NAME,
123                                                  CD_Qualified,
124                                                  MethodHandleDesc.ofConstructor(CD_Qualified,
125                                                                                 CD_Qualifiers,
126                                                                                 CD_Object)));
127      }
128    }
129    return Optional.empty();
130  }
131
132}
